titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 3936) to protect consumers from price-gouging of gasoline and other fuels during energy emergencies, and for other purposes.
Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 3936) to protect consumers from price-gouging of gasoline and other fuels during energy emergencies, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.
Motion to Discharge Committee filed by Ms. Herseth. Petition No: 109-7.

bill.summary: Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (H.R. 3936) to protect consumers from price-gouging of gasoline and other fuels during energy emergencies.
